author: vfede
title: One of the best Technic sets!
review:
The chopper has a great design, high detailed and very solid in his form. The big rear wheels make it very cool, as the front one. It has front and rear lights, a very well inserted spoiler and a big blue seat. The engine has full working chain of transmission, that however makes some problems while the wheels are moving (the chain may don't rotate very smoothly).
The dragster was nearly as cool as the chopper. It is very long and thin, but not poor of particulars, like the pilot seat and steering wheel. The powerfull engine and the big spoiler make the rear very special, and the big wheels are perfect for the proportions of the car. 
In my opinion it's one of the best sets of the high quality Technic of that time.

author: DrZeldenrustig
title: Ultimate Chopper.
review:
Got this model only a few days ago, after looking for it for many a year. Well; It is certainly worth the wait. 

The enginepart of the trike is big and wild and loud. It has more than enough details to give it tha "real"look. Working four-cylinder engine and drive-chain.
(but truly what does this chain drive?)

The steering half and single-demped suspension of the trike looks fragile but is quite sturdy.

The footsteps are a nice detail!

Made a video-review:

http://www.youtube.com/user/hanstolhuisen#p/a/u/0/v3bUvwTmpnk 

Plees leave your comments!
